default.title: Unexpected Error
default.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Please reload the page.

notFound.description: The requested page does not exist

axiosError.title: Server Error
axiosError.description: There was an error while handling the request. Please reload the page.

forbidden.title: Not authorized
forbidden.description: You don't have the necessary permissions to view the page.

authentication.title: Unexpected error during authentication
authentication.description: An error occurred during the authentication process. Please try again.
